Contact.Heading: Hi!, If you want contact us or join it, You have these options:

Paragraphs.Paragraph1:
We are a networking network of Cádiz video game developers. 
Founded in 2023 in San Fernando by Jose Escribano, which was born as a way to bring together people from the province of Cadiz who are dedicated to video game development in any field.
Paragraphs.Paragraph2: In the development of the coming years we became the Official provincial headquarters of the Global Game Jam sponsored by MalagaJam (As National Headquarters/representative/coordinator).
Paragraphs.Paragraph3: Currently we usually do two types of activities:
Paragraphs.Paragraph3a: Meet ups: A way to meet developers in the area, learn about their professional experience, give talks, share opinions, share Feedback or simply chat.
Paragraphs.Paragraph3b: GameJams: Although it is not usually our main dish, we tend to be Plan B in case there are many people from Cádiz (or nearby) who have not been able to obtain a ticket for MalagaJam.
Paragraphs.Paragraph4: If so, we have held the Cadiz GameJam I (in-person) hosting the Global Game Jam of 2024 and the Cadiz GameJam II (Now In-Person) in response to the Summer Edition of the same year.
Paragraphs.Paragraph5: In the end, these activities are done at the request of members and interested parties. Any idea is welcome and will automatically be proposed to a democratic system within the Telegram member group.
